| English | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | than | | | | mine | | | | be | | | | when | | | | I | | | | see | | | | that | | | | I | | | | be | | | | in | | | | the | | | | air | | | | on | | | | every | | | | side | | | | and | | | | I | | | | see | | | | every | | | | sight | | | | extinguish | | | | except | | | | for | | | | that | | | | of | | | | the | | | | beast | | |
